definition: A period of time that occurs between the morning and the evening, typically referring to the hours following midday and preceding sunset. It is commonly used to describe the time of day when people engage in activities such as work, leisure, or socializing, after the main part of the day has passed.

examples.german: Am Nachmittag gehe ich ins Kino.
examples.english: In the afternoon, I'm going to the cinema.
We are meeting on Saturday afternoon.

examples.german: Nachmittags trinke ich gerne eine Tasse Tee.
examples.english: In the afternoon, I like to have a cup of tea.
